TopicTitle: Launch a sattelite in escape velocity...

Articles.Content:
... From the mun and return back to kerbin

Picks ore it did not happen
Which escape velocity? MÃ¼n escape velocity? Kerbin\'s? Kerbol\'s?

What?

Launch a satellite on an escape vector, from the mun?

So do we have to land on the mun, then take off again, launch the satellite at escape velocity, then then return home?
Nah it is just enugh to get to the oppisite site of the mun
Solar escape velocity would be much more interesting. You have to get to the mun, land, take off again and have enough delta-v to propel it to escape velocity AND return home.

From what I understand...

'escape velocity from the Mun and go back to kerbin...'

so we will begin from Mun? sounds plausible.

Solar escape velocity is easy, just make an insanely high apoapsis for solar orbit and burn from there.
